text.div:
XDSRelationshipType

The kind of relationship between two XDS documents

This value set has an inline code system http://hl7.org/fhir/xds-relationship-type, which defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
APND A P N DA separate XDS Document that references a prior document, and may extend or alter the observations in the prior document
RPLC R P L CA new version of an existing document
XFRM X F R MA transformed document is derived by a machine translation from some other format
XFRM_RPLC X F R M R P L CBoth a XFRM and a RPLC relationship
signs SignsThis document signs the target document

name: XDSRelationshipType
description: The kind of relationship between two XDS documents

concept.definition:
A separate XDS Document that references a prior document, and may extend or 
alter the observations in the prior document
A new version of an existing document
A transformed document is derived by a machine translation from some other format

concept.display: X F R M R P L C
concept.definition: Both a XFRM and a RPLC relationship
This document signs the target document
